a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people with developmental intellectual disability, World
Number of people with 'idiopathic developmental intellectual disability', differentiated by sex. This is a category of
disorders defined by delayed or impaired speech, language, motor condition, and visuo-spatial skills. Prevalence has
been age-standardized to compare between countries and with time.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
